snippet.title: Fight'N'Jokes - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Overview:
Fight’n’Jokes is a delightful blend of humor and solid fighting mechanics, set in a retro-style 2D world. Created from original IP, the game offers a fresh take on the traditional fighting game genre, playfully poking fun at its more serious aspects.

Visuals and Animation:
The game is designed with a unique hand-drawn retro-style palette, simulating 256 colors. Its old-school pixel graphics and effects deliver a charming visual experience, enhanced by fast and fluid 60 frames per second animations.

Multiplayer Support:
Fight’n’Jokes now supports Multiplayer with Rollback Netcode through Steam and Epic Online Services, allowing for crossplay between platforms.

Unique Moves and Combat System:
With 31 unique moves, including Punch, Kick, and Block, each character adds their own twist to these standard actions. Animations, audio feedback, and visual effects are tailored for each opponent, providing depth and strategy to every fight.

Diverse Stages:
Battle across 11 themed stages, ranging from City Streets and Medieval Castles to Alien Worlds and Sci-Fi Planets, offering a variety of visually stunning and engaging environments.

Game Modes:
Enjoy 6 local game modes, including Arcade, Versus, Tournament, Survival, Time Attack, and Player Training, offering a range of gameplay experiences for solo and multiplayer enjoyment.

Engaging Storylines:
Each character has a unique story and motivation, leading to hilarious and unexpected outcomes as the game progresses. Unravel the mysteries and rivalries between characters as you progress through the game.

Hidden Characters:
Discover and unlock 4 hidden characters by progressing through the storyline and defeating them in battle. Each hidden character has their own story and motivations, adding depth to the game's lore.

Dynamic Music Soundtracks:
Immerse yourself in the game's 14 unique music soundtracks, each tailored to the character and stage. Music can be disabled or adjusted to suit your preferences.

Additional Features:
Experience multi-hit combos, progress through and defeat the ultimate Boss in a final Boss Battle, and unlock achievements on platforms supporting them, such as Xbox One, PlayStation, and Steam.

Technology:
Fight’n’Jokes utilizes a proprietary game engine, custom-built to deliver a unique and optimized gaming experience, ensuring smooth gameplay and stunning visuals.

Fun Facts:
The first version of Fight’n’Jokes was published for MS-DOS in 1997. After 25 years of review, optimization, and fixing, Fight’n’Jokes is finally ready to be released to the world, offering a nostalgic yet fresh take on the fighting game genre.
